scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "parcel watch src/shared/resources/js/** src/shared/resources/css/** --no-cache --no-source-maps -d ./src/shared/public --global root --target node --public-url ./" "nodemon src/app/index" "DEVELOPMENT=TRUE nodemon src/api/index"
scripts.build: parcel build www/* -d public --global root -t node
